item.description: Frank Bidart, David Ferry, Derek Walcott, Tom Sleigh, Gail Mazur, Lloyd Schwartz, Michael Collier, William Corbett, George Kalogeris, Jennifer Moxley, Sinan Antoon, Rosanna Warren, and Stuart Dischell will be reading new and unpublished poems in honor of Melissa Green. The poet herself will read from her new collection, Fifty-Two, for 10-15 minutes. A reception will follow the reading. Perhaps we shall go to dinner afterwards at Sunset across the street, and workshop over sizzling platters of fajitas.
item.name: A Tribute to Melissa Green
